title: IBM Watson Speech to Text service
introduction: Use the IBM Watson Speech to Text service to transcribe spoken audio to written text. The documentation describes the Speech to Text service for IBM Cloud, IBM Cloud Pak for Data, and IBM Cloud Pak for Data as a Service.

links.title: Getting started with Speech to Text
Tracking events for Speech to Text

section_highlights.title: IBM watsonx large speech model brings generative AI to the phone
section_highlights.description: This blog describes IBM's Large Speech Models (LSMs) and the performance benefits that they offer.
